name: quality-works-automation-project
description: Final Project for Quality Work Test Automation Bootcamp

scripts.clean: rm -R -f cypress/reports; mkdir cypress/reports; rm -f mochawesome.json
scripts.report: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/*.json > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json && start mochawesome-report/mochawesome.html && rm -f mochawesome.json

author: Nicole Maitland
